Review.Titre: I cannot recommend Truconnect
Review.Contenu: I cannot recommend Truconnect. Dealing with them for anything was not simple. Only extremely time consuming.  I do not believe they are capable of handling the services they claim to offer.  If you have an enrollment ID with another service, the second you sign up with them you lose your service.  And then Truconnect takes their time.  So be prepared to be without a phone.  Almost immediately upon switching to Truconnect I felt it was a mistake.  And you are not able to switch again for thirty days.  Then received an email stating the sim card had arrived.  It was not there.  Got another sim card was only able to put in a previous Stratus C5 which is terrible.  Not staying with Truconnect.

Review.Titre: A lifeline that could cost me my life
Review.Contenu: A: have an American who knows more than just what computer screen says.    B: make better antennas for your phones.  Mine is a supposedly a lifeline phone, but do the poor reception I get where I live, if my life were actually in peril, it would  be a high probability  that I will be harmed.    I'm only a couple of miles from the tower, yet my signals goes in and out, or I don't get one at all.    If I am not home I get signal, but that does help me because I can't run a mile done the road in the event that something happens.    In actuality I am not able to run a mile at all.

I just want a device that's not broken. There is glass in my pockets all the time and you can see the hold strip that connects the camera, I had to remove the screen protector just to make the screen respond to touch at all bc it broke that bad.When I'm able to eventually get another free phone, I will order it from another provider and switch my service to them if truconnect doesn't send me another phone to replace this one soon.
